message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%, but we can negotiate if you'd prefer.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I propose a more even split. This is a negotiation, after all.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make up for inflation.  How about 5500 for me and 4500 for you?
This is becoming a serious waste of time, Alice. I'm proposing a compromise where we both get close to half.  Take it or leave it - time is literally money for you.
